en: [This is] a mention of the mercy of your Lord to His servant Zechariah
When he called to his Lord a private call [i.e., supplication].

ar: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّى وَهَنَ الْعَظْمُ مِنِّى
en: He said, "My Lord, indeed my bones have weakened,
and my head has filled with white,
and never have I been in my supplication to You, my Lord, unhappy [i.e., disappointed].
